blogs.title: King's always find the path top the mountains
blogs.body: I have written many posts that things are not always as they seem to us any longer.
blogs.author: godfred

blogs.title: Mama, the most beautiful things I ever had
blogs.body: Your smiles are my blessings as your tears are a warning, though you are I cannot stop myself dreaming and seeing you in my mind and my life. Especially the last moments.
blogs.author: godfred
